original_text: Men and brethren, this scripture must needs have been fulfilled, which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas, which was guide to them that took Jesus.
korean_text: 형제들아 성령이 다윗의 입을 통하여 예수 잡는 자들의 길잡이가 된 유다를 가리켜 미리 말씀하신 성경이 응하였으니 마땅하도다

sentences.original_text: this scripture must needs have been fulfilled
which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before
sentences.korean_translation: 성령께서 다윗의 입을 통해 예전에 말씀하신 것

sentences.original_text: which was guide to them that took Jesus
